parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description: The ID of the interactive messaging application.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the messaging group.

parameters.name: OperatorUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user who performs the operation.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The page number. Default value: 1. Valid values: 1 to 100000.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20. Valid values: 1 to 50.
